parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the video, used as the accompanying status message in any feed story. This parameter can contain mentions of other Facebook Pages using the following syntax:@[page-id]For example the following description would mention the Facebook Developers page inline:Test message @[19292868552] tagUsage of this feature is subject to review but by using Pages you are an admin of (both to make the API call, and to be used in a mention), and an app you are a developer of, you can test it for yourself before review.

parameters.name: file_size
parameters.description: The size of the entire video file in bytes.

parameters.name: file_url
parameters.description: Accessible URL of a video file. Cannot be used with upload_phase.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The video, encoded as form data. This field is required.

parameters.name: start_offset
parameters.description: Start byte position of the file chunk.

parameters.name: thumb
parameters.description: The video thumbnail raw data to be uploaded and associated with a video.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the video.

parameters.name: upload_phase
parameters.description: Type of chunked upload request.

parameters.name: upload_session_id
parameters.description: ID of the chunked upload session.

parameters.name: video_file_chunk
parameters.description: The video file chunk, encoded as form data. This field is required during transfer upload phase.

post.summary: The photo albums created for a group
post.description: The photo albums created for a group

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the newly created album.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The description of the album, which will show up in news feed stories as the status message.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name given to the album. This field is required.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: Privacy settings for the album. If not supplied, this defaults to the privacy level granted to the app in the Login Dialog. This field cannot be used to set a more open privacy setting than the one granted.

parameters.name: cover
parameters.description: Information about the group's cover photo.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A brief description of the group.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to upload content to the group. Only current members of the group can use this.

parameters.name: icon
parameters.description: The URL for the group's icon.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The group ID

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: The group's website.

parameters.name: member_request_count
parameters.description: The number of pending member requests. If the token is for an administrator, this is the total number of outstanding requests.  If the token is for a group member, this will return the number of friends who have requested membership and also use the same app that is making the request.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the group.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The profile that created this group.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: The parent of this group, if it exists.

parameters.name: privacy
parameters.description: The privacy setting of the group. Possible values:CLOSEDOPENSECRET

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: The last time the group was updated (this includes changes in the group's properties and changes in posts and comments if the session user can see them).

parameters.name: cover_url
parameters.description: The url for the cover photo. The image will be downloaded and added to the group's album and then used as a cover photo. This field is required.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: The admin to remove. This is required.

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: The user to make an admin. They must be a member of the group and user of the app. This is required.

get.summary: The photo albums created for a group
get.description: The photo albums created for a group

get.summary: All events that belong to a group
get.description: All events that belong to a group

get.summary: The feed of posts including status updates and links published to this group
get.description: The feed of posts including status updates and links published to this group

post.summary: The feed of posts including status updates and links published to this group
post.description: The feed of posts including status updates and links published to this group

get.summary: The files uploaded to this group
get.description: The files uploaded to this group

parameters.name: download_link
parameters.description: URL to download the file.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The person who uploaded the file.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: The group the file is uploaded to (the same group as in the request).

parameters.name: updated_time
parameters.description: The last time the file was changed.

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: The user to remove. They must be a user of the app. This is required.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The user ID of someone that can appear as the sender of the group invite. If this field is used, the two people must be friends on Facebook for the invite to send. This field is optional.

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: The user to invite. They must have a role in the app such as admin, developer, or tester. This is required.
